text: Type Subtype smime Parameter Description Multipart Signed A clear-signed message in two parts: one is the message and the other is the signature. envelopedData An encrypted S/MIME entity. pkes7-mime degenerate signedData | An entity containing only public- key certificates. CompressedData A compressed S/MIME entity. pkes7-signature | signedData The content type of the signature subpart of a multipart/signed message.
